body: It's not ntr, still ugly bastard though

Wait how is this NTR

Since Chizuru-Chan’s hentai adaptation is coming out on October 1st, I thought that I should skim through the story again so that I can remember what hot stuff is gonna happen in the adaptation. Honestly, I still think that she was a fucking idiot from the first chapter till the last chapter.
the good end 😃👍
it's not really NTR it's NTR for her only her and i don't feel bad for her cause its her own fcking fault just be thankful that the man is not her bf or something
she's just hurting her self :<<<

Honestly even though I made that comment below, I know that I’m gonna bust a fat nut to this series’s hentai adaptation😂 Also I wonder if they’re gonna make an episode with chizuru and Chii-Chan in it?

To be honest is this series really even an NTR series?? Because it’s not like her and the teacher were together or anything. This is more of an unrequited love type of shit. Well whatever, even though I feel kinda bad for her, at the same time I don’t because she was a fucking idiot for asking the teacher himself if he was embezzling money or not and for listening to her “master’s” every lewd demands, before she eventually gave in to him.
sorta happy ending? i guess lmao

But that doesn't mean an NTR if even you know they won't love you. Because you honestly doesn't have that much relationship with them.

It's still not as good as the previous one's, but neither less, still good.
Continue your amazing work Mucha!

Ehh...it could've been better, but still still pretty good
Let that hoe do what she want,  carefull with that AIDS she spread lmao

@metroid i get that but bitching and giving your opinion is different though. cause them vanillafag always bitch and bitch till it grates my very nerves, though i learned to ignore them but what i really don't like is them telling people to kill themselves(and they even shortened it to KYS) for reading NTR tagged doujins and people giving their opinions of it, and that is way i said that comment cause even you will have your patience shatter with comments telling people to kill themselves.
In every NTR  manga there's someone bitching about the NTR in it.WTF!

@AngryTentacles You miss the point just because i hate the bitching of vanillafaggots doesnt mean I am against freedom of speech . This is a a fucking public comment section which means anybody is free to express their thoughts anyway they like even though it's annoying as fuck. There is nothing you can do about it, accept it and move on  but repeatedly bitching about vanillafaggots comments is as  annoying as, hell even more ,  the actual bitching of vanillafaggots. You have 2 choices, either ignore them or fuck with them like I do but bitching about their comments is just pointless bitching. Sure, you can keep doing it but as I said it's pointless.

@metroid ouch dude, ouch. i ain't that butthurt cause i know of what will happen even when this was not yet out, you know? i mean Much has another work of the same premise title Chii-chan or something like that, also dude i thought you hate the vani**afa**ots, so why the change of heart?

This ain't ntr you morons the teacher was never in love with  the girl  to begin with thus making it impossible to steal the girl from him and AngryTentacles stop being such a butthurt bitch, anybody can comment anyway they like.

love this artist and happy ending yay

Also at least she is happy in the end even though she is considered Tamura's slave but well she broke when she saw those shoes anyway, and considering that she still persevered and didn't break from chapter 1 to 4 (she still love Tsukino) even when she was made to do humiliating things.. well now that I said my piece which will be used by vanilla****s against me~ I bid you all adieu~ and have a nice evening of reading.

@SilverLight yeah... shame to cause they will be cumming in droves.. get it? Cumming? Hehehe... well anyway it's good that a peaceful doujin page is yet to be sullied by them until they see it, well nothing last, also @Shady her character is based of his other work with the same premise and plus her teacher seems like a total douchebag cause he is being surrounded by all female students add the fact that the one in his home is either a student or a Co female teacher.

I mean I adore netorare but this shit is fucked up. At least give her a chance to fuck Tsukino once and then that fat fuck Tamura can do whatever the fuck he wants. I guess how this story unfolds in this chapter is not my forte but I'd be lying is Chizuru isn't developed well holy sweet baby!
You're fighting a futile battle, AngryTentacles; knowing the king and queen vanilla fags, they'll be here within 24 hours to bitch.

Yaouch~ that got her heart crumble and lost her will to escape from her douchebag teacher though happy end at the same time though cause she is now happy, anyway TO THOSE WHO DON'T LIKE NTR DO NOTE THAT THIS SITE HAS A BLACKLIST OPTION, SO BLACKLIST NTR OR ANY TAG YOU DON'T LIKE INSTEAD IF ENTERING A DOUJIN THAT IS KNOWN TO CONTAIN NTR OR SAID TAG YOU HATE AND SAY SHIT LIKE "KILL YOURSELVES" OR THE LIKE, AND IF YOU STILL COMMENT THINGS LIKE THAT IT MEANS YOU ARE A CUCK YOURSELF AND SHOULD ALSO KILL YOURSELF.
